title: more
Lyrics:
31 ContributorsTranslationsBahasa IndonesiaУкраїнськаTürkçePortuguêsहिन्दीEnglishRomanizationMORE LyricsIntroducing Jack In The Box, is the album’s lead single “MORE” by BTS member, ​j-hope. The song marks his solo comeback since Hope World.

On “MORE” j-hope explores how he wants a successful life as a singer,… Read More [제이홉 "MORE" 가사]

[Verse 1]
Yeah, I'm thirsty
필요해 비트 위 surfin'
난 물 만난 물고기

title: sweet dreams
Lyrics:
26 ContributorsTranslationsTürkçeItalianoEspañol한국어Sweet Dreams Lyrics“Sweet Dreams” is j-hope’s first release as a lead artist following his discharge from military service in October 2024. The R&B-Pop track marks his first collaboration with American singer-songwriter Miguel.… Read More [Pre-Chorus: Miguel, j-hope, Both]

Nothin' that's not allowed
You should never sleep alone (Sleep alone)

Any night, any time, you are my appetite
Double vision, Gemini, and it goes like this
Take you home, take it slow, 'til you bite your lip

Closed curtains, open eyes
Lay down your skin on mine
Leave all the rest to me

Lyrics:

We'll never ever give up, forever
I'll say it again

Get up, neu
Get up, ron

Better run
